3 // Method to print connected components in an
4 // undirected graph
5 std::vector<std::vector<int>> DepthFirstSearch::connectedComponents()
6 {
7  // Mark all the vertices as not visited
8  bool *visited = new bool[V];
9  for(int v = 0; v < V; v++)
10  visited[v] = false;
11 
12  for (int v=0; v<V; v++)
13  {
14  if (visited[v] == false)
15  {
16  // print all reachable vertices
17  // from v
18  DFSUtil(v, visited);
19 
20 
21  graphs.push_back(connected_components);
22  connected_components.clear();
23  //cout << "\n";
24  }
25 
26  }
27  return graphs;
28 }
29 
30 void DepthFirstSearch::DFSUtil(int v, bool visited[])
31 {
32  // Mark the current node as visited and print it
33  visited[v] = true;
34  //cout << v << " ";
35  connected_components.push_back(v);
36  // Recur for all the vertices
37  // adjacent to this vertex
38  std::list<int>::iterator i;
39  for(i = adj[v].begin(); i != adj[v].end(); ++i)
40  if(!visited[*i])
41  DFSUtil(*i, visited);
42 }
43 
44 DepthFirstSearch::DepthFirstSearch(int V)
45 {
46  this->V = V;
47  adj = new std::list<int>[V];
48 }
49 
50 // method to add an undirected edge
51 void DepthFirstSearch::addEdge(int v, int w)
52 {
53  adj[v].push_back(w);
54  adj[w].push_back(v);
55 }
